pros: Comfortable, soft ride; Excellent padding; Breathable upper; Grippy and durable outsole; Secure fit; Budget-friendly; Doubles as a gym shoe
cons: Not very responsive; Upper and midsole feel cheap
RR_verdict: The Nike Air Winflo comes back with its 9th edition and we found it to be a worthy update. Now with a better upper, softer midsole, and more precise fit, it confirms to be an honest daily trainer for beginners. With its attractive price point, it’s perfect for those looking for an affordable alternative to the (many) expensive shoes on the market.
use: Jogging |, Treadmill |, Walking |, All-day wear |, For beginners
